transportAdvice: Arusha's town center is walkable for short distances, but tourist sites and safari staging areas are spread out and best reached by taxi or arranged transfers. Shared minibus taxis (dala-dalas) serve local routes but can be crowded and confusing for visitors; private taxis are widely available and recommended for tourists.
